content.text:
# 2025 PVL Press Corps Awards Night

| website        =
| main           = PVL PC Awards Night
| next           = 2026
}}
The 2025 Pilipinas Live PVL Press Corps Awards Night is an upcoming inaugural awards show of the PVL Press Corps Awards Night. It will also recognize personalities from the main volleyball leagues in the Philippines, Premier Volleyball League, and Spikers' Turf. It will be held on May 28, 2025, at the Novotel Manila Araneta City in Quezon City.
Criteria
The winners will be decided based on overall statistics from the three conferences and votes from team representatives and members of the PVL Press Corps to ensure objective and impartial selections. The scope of the awards will span the following conferences/seasons:
* Premier Volleyball League
** 2024 Reinforced Conference;
** 2024 Invitational Conference; and
** 2024–25 All-Filipino Conference.
* Spikers' Turf
** 2024 season; and
** 2025 Open Conference.
